named-query.name: consulta.auditorias.institucion
named-query.query: select o from Auditoria o where o.planAnual.institucion.insId = ?1 and o.audFechaInicioProgramado between ?2 and ?3 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: consulta.auditoria.no.finalizada
named-query.query: select o from Auditoria o where o.regActivo = 1 and o.audFase not in (5) and o.planAnual.institucion.insId = ?1

named-native-query.name: consulta.stat.auditoria.estado
named-native-query.query: select TOTAL, sum(case when fase = "PROGRAMADA" then sub else 0 end) as "PROGRAMADA", sum(case when fase = "PLANIFICACION" then sub else 0 end) as "PLANIFICACION", sum(case when fase = "EJECUCION" then sub else 0 end) as "EJECUCION", sum(case when fase = "INFORME" then sub else 0 end) as "INFORME", sum(case when fase = "SEGUIMIENTO" then sub else 0 end) as "SEGUIMIENTO", sum(case when fase = "FINALIZADA" then sub else 0 end) as "FINALIZADA" from ( select "TOTAL", case when aud_fase = 0 then "PROGRAMADA" when aud_fase = 1 then "PLANIFICACION" when aud_fase = 2 then "EJECUCION" when aud_fase = 3 then "INFORME" when aud_fase = 4 then "SEGUIMIENTO" when aud_fase = 5 then "FINALIZADA" end as fase, count(aud_id) sub from auditoria a inner join plan_anual b on a.aud_pla_id = b.pla_id where a.reg_activo = 1 and b.pla_ins_id = ?1 and aud_fecha_inicio_programado between ?2 and ?3 group by aud_fase ) as r

named-native-query.name: consulta.cantidad.hallazgos.estado
named-native-query.query: select TOTAL, sum(case when estado = "REDACCION" then sub else 0 end) as "REDACCION", sum(case when estado = "REVISION" then sub else 0 end) as "REVISION", sum(case when estado = "COMUNICAR" then sub else 0 end) as "COMUNICAR", sum(case when estado = "COMUNICADO" then sub else 0 end) as "COMUNICADO", sum(case when estado = "ANALISIS" then sub else 0 end) as "ANALISIS", sum(case when estado = "FINALIZADO" then sub else 0 end) as "FINALIZADO" from ( SELECT "TOTAL", (CASE WHEN (a.ced_estado = 1) THEN 'REDACCION' WHEN (a.ced_estado = 2) THEN 'REVISION' WHEN (a.ced_estado = 3) THEN 'COMUNICAR' WHEN (a.ced_estado = 4) THEN 'COMUNICADO' WHEN (a.ced_estado = 5) THEN 'ANALISIS' WHEN (a.ced_estado = 6) THEN 'FINALIZADO' END) AS estado, COUNT(a.ced_id) AS sub FROM cedula_notas a inner join auditoria b on a.ced_aud_id = b.aud_id inner join plan_anual c on b.aud_pla_id = c.pla_id where a.reg_activo = 1 and c.pla_ins_id = ?1 and aud_fecha_inicio_programado between ?2 and ?3 GROUP BY a.ced_estado order by a.ced_estado ASC) as r
